summary: A preteen's life turns upside down when he befriends the new girl in school and they imagine a whole new fantasy world to escape reality.
cast: Josh Hutcherson|AnnaSophia Robb|Zooey Deschanel|Robert Patrick|Bailee Madison|Kate Butler|Devon Wood|Emma Fenton|Grace Brannigan|Latham Gaines|Judy McIntosh|Patricia Aldersley|Lauren Clinton|Isabelle Rose Kircher|Cameron Wakefield|Elliot Lawless|Carly Owen|Jen Wolfe|James Gaylyn|Ian Harcourt|Brandon Cook|Tyler Atfield|Maisy McLeod-Riera|Hudson Mills|Matt Gibbons|Phil Grieve|Fernando Gonzalez|Mikaila Baumel|Aaron Beard|Luke Burnyeat|Zoe Cramond|Dwight Wilson II|Shelby Young
title: Un puente hacia Terabithia
